data.title: Birth & Birthday Announcements from the Bridgeport Index Newspaper
data.meta_description: Links to birth and birthday announcements from the Bridgeport Index Wise County Texas.
data.text:
Newspaper Clippings From The Bridgeport Index

Wise County, Texas

Birth Announcements & Birthday Celebrations 1910-1999

(Some of the papers are from 1910 to 1975-most are 1940's and newer)

(All of the papers from 1976 to 1999 were bound into large books)

Click here to go back to the "Searcher" that finds names in all of these pages

The older births and birthdays (pre 1976) were isolated from the whole newspaper pages by David Pitts paw281@sbcglobal.net. He also combined all of the information together (3,846 announcements) and made this page that links the names with the clipping images.

The "Bridgeport Index" newspapers were kindly provided for imaging by Harlan and Keith Bridwell (Owners and Editors) and Joann Pritchard (Editor).
